# BIOTICA R Package

[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/biotica)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=biotica)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/biotica/biotica/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/biotica/biotica/actions)

R package for BIOTICA statistical analysis.

## Installation

```r
# From CRAN (when available)
install.packages("biotica")

# From source
install.packages("path/to/biotica", repos = NULL, type = "source")
```

Usage

```r
library(biotica)

# Compute IBR
params <- list(VCA = 0.85, MDI = 0.78, PTS = 0.82)
result <- ibr_composite(params)
print(result)

# Detect tipping points
ts <- cumsum(rnorm(200))
tipping <- tipping_points(ts, window = 30)
print(tipping)
```

Functions

· ibr_composite(): Compute IBR index
· bayesian_weights(): Estimate Bayesian weights
· tipping_points(): Detect tipping points
· food_web_analysis(): Analyze food webs
· plot_ibr(): Plot IBR results
· validate_parameters(): Validate parameters
